review: I found this to be a very good product, it responds very quick, has a lot of extra apps you can download and use with it, including games to play on TV. The only drawback is, you cannot  steam anything to your TV from any  “ios” product, like (iPhone) (iPad) or (iPod) otherwise I recommend it if you want a good product, for a good price.
author: Stanley H.

review: Got this when it launched for $19 so that's a big plus for me. I'm a huge Amazon fan and I was going to buy the Fire TV but just happened to catch this first.It was super easy to install and set up. I have not run into any problems as far as loading or downloading games, apps, shows, or music. The picture quality is wonderful. My almost 4 year old has already mastered getting to the shows or games that he wants so it's obviously not difficult to use.I don't have any experience with ChromeCast, Roku, etc. so I can't compare anything to them. However, I am very happy with the Fire TV stick and don't feel the need to check out any other streaming devices.
author: Jen

review: So easy to use and the app makes it so much fun. This was a great buy

review: The Fire TV Stick is just what I hoped it would be. I was ready to use it after plugging it in and entering my network settings. I've used the Pandora app and watched a couple of movies on it. I like how you don't have to turn it off. My only disappointment is the availability of the remote app. It is not available for iOS. It is not available for the first generation Kindle Fire.
